title: Surf2VolCoord
description: Relates node indices to coordinates given x y z coordinates and returns the nodes closest to them.

grid_vol.title: Grid Volume
grid_vol.description: Specifies the grid for the output volume.

grid_subbrick.title: Grid Subbrick
grid_subbrick.description: Sub-brick from which data are taken.

sv.title: Surface Volume
sv.description: Surface Volume file aligning with the surface.

closest_nodes.title: Closest Nodes
closest_nodes.description: A coordinate file specifying coordinates for which the closest nodes will be found.

qual.title: Qual string
qual.description: A string of characters that qualify the surface in which the closest node was found.

lpi.title: LPI Flag
lpi.description: Coordinate axis direction for values in XYZ.1D are in LPI.

rai.title: RAI Flag
rai.description: Coordinate axis direction for values in XYZ.1D are in RAI (default).

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: Output results to file PREFIX (will overwrite). Default is stdout.
